case.state: Hello there! How are you? Are you ready to play?
Hey! Hello! How are you feeling? Prepared to play?
Oh, hello! Thanks for having me! I hope you're prepared to play!
It would be... wrong to take some of this treasure, right?
Playing here is pretty convenient. There's a good chance we'll want to wash up after all this.
Isn't the moon lovely? It's also very, very, very far away.
Looking up at the moon used to make me a little lonely. Now it just makes me feel kind of accomplished!
Are we going to need flashlights?
The darkness makes it... kinda sultry, huh?
I guess I should have figured it would be mostly guys...
Well... I guess gramps does say I'm one of the boys...
Oh, outnumbered by men. Just like back at home...
I thought having some girls here would relax me, but now I'm just thinking you could be checking me out too.
I think I'd be a little uncomfortable if it was just guys here.
I guess this will be kind of like looking at the dirty magazines Mega Man has under his bed. It's all girls, but I don't really hate looking through them.
Is this everyone? I think there's room for a couple more people.
Are we just going to have three in? I think that could be fun.
A small group wouldn't be so bad, but a big group might be more comfortable.
The more the merrier, of course!
So is this the whole group or are we waiting for one more person?
Is this everyone now? Just the four of us?
Oh, this is good! I think I'll feel a lot more comfortable in a big group!
It looks like everyone is here now! Shouldn't we get going?
It should be a lot of fun with lots of people! Does this mean we're ready to start now?
So... that's a butterfly, right?
This isn't the sort of thing I usually do, but it should be pretty exciting.
I'm Roll, if you didn't know. I'm sure we're about to get to know each other very well.
Okay, let's get going! I know I'm ready to go!
I should probably just stick with these, right?
I can just use what I already have on hand!
No, let's not get greedy! I'll just keep these cards.
Oh, there's no way I'm pushing my luck more than this!
W-wait! Actually, let me just keep all these!
I guess I'll exchange these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Can I get ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? That would be great!
I'm going to do ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ this time, if that's okay.
Two? No, four? No... ~cards.text~, yes? Yes.
Honestly, I'm sort of just guessing here.
Let's see if I can make anything from what you've got!
I'm not sure I can salvage this...
I hope this is worth the risk...
This just needs a bit of a tune-up.
I'm going to need ~cards.text~ this time and a good ~cards.text~ at that!
What are the odds someone else has what I'm looking for?
I'll give you ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, but there's one I really would like in return!
Oh! Okay! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please!
Gosh, I don't even know this time...
Oh, what to do, what to do?
Hm... probably shouldn't overthink it.
Maybe it'll just work itself out?
I sort of like my chances. ~Cards.text~ this time.
Hm... wwweeeeeeell...
My gut tells me I should get rid of ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
What are the chances I can actually improve this?
Um... I need ~cards.text~ very specific ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ back...
~Cards.text~? I guess?
Sometimes it's hard deciding how many to give up...
I hope everything works out this time. I've got a good feeling about this.
Looks like it's smooth sailing for me!
This is a lot of fun! It's a little weird, but I think I was craving a little excitement.
Are you doing okay? You're not getting distracted, are you?
Okay, I'm all set! Get ready to read 'em and weep!
Card games aren't that hard for me. Just like engineering and cooking, it's all about putting the right pieces together.
How is it going over there? Did you get the hand you wanted?
Even when it looks like the coast is clear, it's best to be careful.
If I can fly the Flutter through pirate attacks while making sure Mega Man doesn't fall off the deck, I can certainly stay focused on this game no matter what happens!
Looks like I've gotten this taken care of all by myself!
I don't see anything I need to worry about here!
Not too shabby for a grease monkey, eh?
Hey, if you can't take the heat then get out from under the car hood!
You don't need any help fine tuning your hand, do you, ~player~?
Always make sure you show up with the right tool for the job. Let me show you what I mean...
I think I've lost enough for now. Somebody else should get to have a turn!
Alright, no more mistakes! Now I've got this whole thing figured out!
Nope, not this time! I'm fully prepared for whatever you have!
Might as well get comfy!
It's satisfying to put something together that'll work!
Oh, I'm not finished quite yet! A spotter can always find a way out of a sticky situation!
Looks like you've got trouble up ahead!
I've got a nose for treasure, and it's telling me we're about to be onto something!
Looks like someone is going to be getting a little upgrade to their wardrobe.
I'm about to bust this wide open!
Alright, back at the wheel! You'd better hold onto your pants!
Nope! You're not going to find anything this time!
I could still win this completely by accident, but I'd need someone else to have the accident.
Sometimes you just have to dive in and hope for the best!
I'm glad we're not playing for zenny. Money is tight enough as it is.
I think I'd rather see everyone naked than be naked. That's normal, right?
Gosh, I haven't had this much excitement in a long time. Not without risking my or Mega Man's life, at least.
Maybe I should try being more careful with my cards...
Hope this doesn't throw a wrench in things...
Looks like my chances are better than zero!
It's nice just to have a moment where I don't have to worry about pirates or reaverbots.
Maybe I should have brought something to tinker with...
Don't worry about me! I've got myself covered!
I wonder what Mega Man is up to right now. He might be better equipped to come out on top...
Hm, I wonder if it would be difficult to build a robot that deals cards...
A good spotter is always on the lookout for danger! In my professional opinion... we're probably safe here!
I figured coming here would be a good experience for me. Sometimes life on the Flutter can be... well... unstimulating?
Statistical analysis is not my area of expertise, but I am good at getting useful stuff from junk! Maybe I've got a knack for this game?
Uh-oh. I think I might have messed up.
Oh! I better watch out!
I've got a bad feeling about this round...
Hey! What's the big idea with these cards?
Sorry, I wasn't able to make anything good with the cards I was given.
So to~background.time~ might not be my ~background.time~.
Wait a minute! How did I mess that up? What happened?
I hope you did well, ~player~. That would at least make one of us.
Well, even junk is worth something...
Of course. Right when I need smooth sailing, I hit turbulence.
Where did that come from? What happened? This doesn't look good for me.
I did the best I could with the materials I was given.
Mega Man wouldn't sweat losing so much, would he?
How much is it going to set me back to get these cards upgraded?
I know useless scrap when I see it...
I'd prefer not to just be barely scraping by...
I pushed my luck a bit too far on that one. I figured it would be worth the risk at this point.
Losing wouldn't be so bad, right? Hm, maybe I shouldn't give up yet.
Uh-oh. I... uh, think I messed up again.
I might just end up crashing and burning...
Maybe I need to go back to the drawing board with my strategy here...
I don't know how I messed this up. It's not like it's rocket science! And I know rocket science!
I guess there really is not accounting for luck as a variable.
Ugh, this is embarrassing. You'd think I couldn't count up to three or something.
Yeah, this wouldn't be the first time something I put together blew up in my face.
I'm getting so excited I can hardly focus on what I'm doing...
Ah-ha ha... whoops!
Sometimes you have to take a leap of faith... and sometimes that doesn't work out at all.
You can't actually be that delusional, Don Patch.
W-what? Are you making fun of me?!
H-huh? What? That never happened! D-did it? Stop spreading lies!
It's so hard to pick! I really like apricots myself, especially baked into a pie. I bake them all the time to share with gramps and Mega Man.

We had a cat on the Flutter for a while! She ended up having kittens, so it became a bit more than we could manage. They were all so cute, but we took them someplace they could have owners who would take real good care of them!
I would teach myself rocket science. Make sure I had it down forwards and backwards before having to cooperate with the most difficult person in the world.
Oh, yeah! I've kept a diary for years! I think it really helps me organize my thoughts! It's good to check in with yourself whenever something stressful happens.
Hee hee, I like the way you talk to me, but in all honesty I'm not so sure what to do. I just know if you told me what to do, I'd be very excited to play along...
... If I could see how I turn you on... that'd be hot...
Hmm... losing some of that clothing would be a good start. I mean, it's only fair!
W-wait! I-I'm not much of a fighter!
H-hey! Hold on! I don't fight! I just have a supporting role!
W-we're still just playing cards, right? I don't want to fight you!
Does anyone else feel a little weird? I feel... a little weird? I don't know how else to put it.
.... Huh... what was... I guess it was nothing. Weird.
Something is... just slightly off, right? I mean, this place is weird normally, but this is a different weird... a weirder weird? Maybe?
I don't need much, really. It's nice to have someone who can cook and draw a bath for me when I've been in the workshop all day.
It might be a little shallow, but I do like getting surprise gifts. It just makes me feel like... like even when we're not together he's thinking about me...

Sometimes I feel like just having around in my pajamas all day. I feel kind of bad since Mega Man does all the housework on those days, but I really appreciate that he'll let me take a day off like that.

Well, I'm not big on going to spas or getting massages or anything like that. I find my work therapeutic, really. Sometimes if everyone just lets me work in peace, it makes me feel like they care enough to give me space!
I don't think there's anything wrong with your name! I don't mind saying it at all!
The only instruments I'm good with are the instruments on my spotter panel. I'm not really musically inclined, unfortunately.

I haven't really given that sort of thing too much thought, Kumatora. If there's something Mega Man or I can't do, I usually build something to help us get it done. I'm not sure what I would need a superpower for.

A superpower? Gosh, I don't know. Maybe something to help keep Mega Man safe? Like I could sense danger for him? My spotting equipment sort of already does that though, so maybe that power would be wasted on me.
I wish I knew how to make some fast money. Unfortunately, digging is kind of a tricky business. You just have to cross your fingers and hope you find a big refractor or something like that.
H-huh? Could that happen?!
... I'm pretty sure "grenade launcher" isn't the answer you're looking for...
I'd sure have a lot of trouble getting my work done without a plasma torch! It's more of a lifesaver than a time saver!
Living on an airship, the newspaper doesn't always get delivered on time. Thanks to the TV though, we can get all the news we need wherever we go!
My whole toolbox is full of stuff like that! No matter which of our little conveniences break down, I can just fix it good as new! Knowing I can do that is comforting!
A demigod? I guess I shouldn't be so surprised...
Kitsune? Demigods? ... Oh, I probably shouldn't think about it too much.
I sort of wish I could be that selfless... but if I did everything for free we wouldn't have food or a place to live...
I'd love to be that accommodating, but I can't do everything for free. It takes a lot of money to maintain an airship and good scrap doesn't come cheap!
800?! Should... shouldn't you be taller?
You can't really be 800, right? Even a machine would be completely broken down if it was that old...
Does that really work? Someone offers up something valuable and then you're just... here?
Maybe I need a shrine. People could make offerings to me and I could fix their stuff...
I don't know what Tron does to the Servbots in her torture room, but my answer is I definitely don't want that.
Whatever my punishment is, I just don't want to clean the bathroom...
This feels a lot more hostile all of a sudden...
I don't think I like how Cammy is staring at me...
You're not going to hurt me... right?
Why did it have to be me and her left?
I really feel like she might hurt me!
Oh no, Juri is looking even scarier than usual!
Please promise we're just going to stick to cards!
Please don't break my bones!
Well, if confidence is sexy, then that's certainly a sexy pose!
It's not the kind of pose I've ever seen in a magazine, Kyouko...
Kyouko, if you were taking this more seriously you might have some more clothes left...
I mean... it's not not sexy...
You know... I sort of wish I had the sort of confidence to just strike a pose...
When was the last time I was barefoot in the grass? I need to get out of the Flutter more!
Hmm, feeling the grass between your toes... you don't get any of that flying around the ocean.
Sort of cold around here, huh? Did the rest of you notice that?
It's almost a little boring when you don't lose, but I bet I won't feel quite the same when I do have to strip!
If this keeps up, I'm going to get a big head over all this! Better step it up!
Feels like my luck has finally turned around! Oh! But I shouldn't say that out loud, right? That's bad luck!
I'm surprised I'm still in this. It sure felt like things were headed downhill before!
Gosh, I'm feeling nearly unbeatable! Come on! Knock me off of my high horse already!
If being a pilot has taught me anything, it's that when you've been sailing along for this long without incident you're about to hit turbulence!
How did things end up like this? I thought I was going to lose for sure before! Now... now I'm starting to think I'm going to win!
Has anyone else noticed I haven't lost at all for a while? I hope not. I'd hate to jinx it...
Alright! It's just you and me! No hard feelings no matter how it goes, okay?
No need to get competitive just because we're the only ones left! We should just continue to have fun, right?
By any chance, has anyone seen a little monkey running around? I can't say for sure, but it's possible our robot Data followed me here. He has a weird habit of showing up wherever we go.

This is probably going to sound crazy, but could you guys let me know if you see a monkey? It's possible that it's Data, our... uh, pet, I guess? Sometimes we go somewhere and he's already there, so I'm worried he followed me here somehow.
Be careful, ~player~. You never know what's going to happen in this kind of game.
I guess I should be safe this time. What about you, ~player~? Do you think you can make out okay?
Alright, ~player~. Let's just do our best!
No... well, yes, well... not bikes exclusively. Really, I'll work on anything with moving parts.
I haven't done much work on bikes. I mostly work on my airship, but honestly I'll work on anything mechanical.
Sort of? It wasn't all that large, but I did build a rocket to go to the moon and back...
I think the Flutter is bigger than you're imagining it. We all have our own rooms, plus a kitchen, two bathrooms, and a living room! There's also the engine room and my R&D workshop.
Are you using my name as a pun to brag about killing people?
Well, what can I say? I've loved working on machines ever since I was little! It's a good thing too because our ship needs a lot of attention.
Sometimes it's a lot of work, but I do enjoy working on the ship and building new weapons. It's all stuff that has to get done anyway, so I'm just lucky I find it so fun!
It depends on what I can get my hands on. Most days I'm just doing repairs and maintenance on the ship, but sometimes Mega Man will bring me some scrap to build him some armor or weapons.

I don't really have the time or resources to work on extra projects. Maintaining the Flutter eats up most of our cash. The only other thing I do regularly is make weapons and armor for Mega Man from the scrap he digs up.

B-b-b-boyfriend?! N-no! No? Of course not! H-he's like my brother! I mean, I love him, but it's totally platonic! There's been some sexually charged moments between us, b-b-b-but we haven't even kissed! Not that I want that! But I don't not want it?
For me, it's gotta be the Blade Arm attachment I made for Mega Man's armor! It generates a concentrated beam of plasma that can cut through steel like it was tissue paper!
Well, I could do something like that, but I'm pretty sure you wouldn't want me to.
That was be entirely possible, but... but are you really sure you want that? I'm not so sure you are...
Ah... well... um... that sort of stuff is expensive, but I've always got plenty of scrap parts and material around...
Not to brag, but I'm pretty handy in the kitchen too. Cooking, baking, you name it!
Well, that's his name. It's the one I gave to him, actually.
Mega Man is the one who goes into the ruins during our dig outs. He assumes a lot of the risk, puts himself in harm's way. He does lots for us and me personally.
Unfortunately, I don't. I did spend a lot of time with Tron while we were building our rocket to rescue Mega Man, but there's just no getting along with her. She's nothing but a huge pain butt!
I guess I am a little nervous. It's just, you're so beautiful, Maria. Next to you, I-I'm not so sure anyone would care about me.
Winning would be nice, but it wouldn't be the worst thing in the world to lose, right? It might even be fun.
Oh, I was worried people might think these clothes are weird.
Yes, I am. Sorry, that must seem pretty boring to someone who can do magic...
Yes, yes, I'm aware my name is also a word. Every time I think I've heard them all, someone comes up with something new and embarrassing...
Title? No, that's just his name. Mega Man Volnutt.
Sometimes we find treasure, but anything that isn't actually useful never turns out to be very valuable. Mostly we're just after refractors.
I'm sure you know the answer to that, Kaz. I wouldn't feel too bad about it; I don't exactly dislike you.
I'm not so sure I could do that. I'm perfectly happy with my work now. Being in front of a camera sounds like it would be a little scary.
Do you know who left them behind? A lot of the records we find left behind are pretty cryptic. It was a long time before we really understood anything about who made the ruins.
That's kind of a long story, but the gist of it is he had to go. If he hadn't gone, it might've been the end of life on the planet.
The underlying principles of low orbit flight are not so complex that travel to the moon is unfeasible, but when someone refuses to listen to good sense and just messes up everything...
I thought I was going to be a nervous wreck, but I'm having a lot more fun than I thought I would!
I'm not so sure. I can't stop think about losing and how good it would feel to touch myself...
Rock? Rock who? Did you mean Mega Man?
Not literally "any two things." That should probably be obvious, but... well, I guess not to someone like you.
What's a "robot master?"
Look, I'm sure I didn't make it easy for her to get along with me, but she's so stubborn and stuck-up I don't know who could get along with her.
Is that a come on or are you just hungry?
Yeah! Absolutely! Did you have a mechanical question?
It sounds like you have a mechanical question for me, Dwight.
So you worked as a mechanic too, huh? I've always worked with machines. Runs in my family! At least, the last few generations.
It's always nice to meet a fellow mechanic, even a former one. I've been working with machines my whole life! It's kind of a family tradition!
Really? I can sorta imagine you in a denim jumpsuit and all covered in oil. Oil is the universal uniform of all mechanics.
That's pretty standard for a lot of mechanics, I think. It is pretty easy to imagine you in your little jumpsuit with a wrench in hand.
Oh, no, they're not for fighting. I work with heavy machinery, so I wear them for protection. I wouldn't want something chopping off my toes, after all!
While I'm sure it would hurt if I kicked you with these, they're actually reinforced for my protection. I don't need a big 'ol piece of sheet metal smashing my poor toes!
I don't know how we would get by without Mega Man! Gramps is too old to go down into ruins and I'm no good at fighting. Also, Mega Man cleans the toilets, so we're really lucky we found him!
Oh, Mega Man more than pulls his own weight. Honestly, we'd be lost without him! He's an essential part of our digging operations and just a real member of our family!
Oh, we sure have! We've found out more than I really ever cared to know about our history. I could stand to forget some of the things we learned!
Yeah, we sure found out some things. We found out some really, really, really troubling things about the past...
Yeah, that's me. Wait, you know Mega Man? Huh? How? From where? What?
Oh, but I do have a guy back at home. Guys plural, in fact! There's Gramps and Data and Mega Man too, of course!

Oh, I love motorcycles! I sort of wish I had one, but they're not very practical for transporting equipment. I did build one once, but I had to disassemble it and turn it back into a pitching machine.
Oh... well, strictly speaking I'm not exactly human, but as far as I know I'm not any different than one! I'm still an organic lifeform!

I don't think about what happens if we fail. I just do what has to be done to make sure we all come out okay in the end. After all is said and done, it's good that the pirates made it out okay. When we needed their help, they did step up for us.

As a spotter, I don't waste time thinking about the worst case scenario. I just focus on doing everything I can to make sure we all make it out in one piece. And keeping the pirates alive hasn't been all bad. Sometimes they come and help us out.
Of course! Whenever we've needed to borrow a boat, we always end up with ones that either barely runs or doesn't run, but I've never had any trouble getting them back into shape!
Well, I fix and build machines. That's really all there is to it. Do you not have mechanics where you come from?
You don't have to wonder. The thought of showing you has me... I just want to show you.
Talk is nice... but I want more than talk from you...
Well, for me working on machines is just a lot of fun! I like taking all the little pieces, seeing how they fit and mesh, and then watching them all work together.
I think it's a lot of fun to build machines and stuff like that! There's a lot of satisfaction that comes with putting something together and then watching it work and move all on its own!
Of course, ask away! I can't promise I'll know for sure, but I'll do my best!
Hey, if you've got mechanical questions, then I'm all ears! I'll give it my best shot!
Really? Another girl mechanic? That's awesome! It's like wherever I go I'm usually the only one! This is great!
Ah, gosh, I'm not all that special. I do my best most days, but even I get stumped sometimes!
Oh, that's probably motor oil. My clothes are probably covered in it...
What?! Me?! A mage?! N-no, I'm just a mechanic! I can't do magic! I'm pretty sure magic isn't real... normally.
Well, these are my work clothes. They're just supposed to keep me from getting too dirty and let me move around comfortably. Not very stylish, but I've never been very flashy.
I take a lot of machines apart too... and even a lot of the stuff I build ends up being used to wreck machines too...
That's fine, Sheena, but experience with what, exactly?
I'm not really cut out for combat. Most I ever do in a fight is try and drive us out of there. Also, his name is Mega Man.
Is that the impression you get? I'm closer to him than anyone else! I don't think we fit into any sort of neat category...
Oh, please don't let me choke right at the very end!
You got me again! I was just starting to think I might have this nailed down...
Not again! I miss having backup...
I've got a really really bad feeling about this all of a sudden...
Oh, why is there no one else here to take a turn...
Gosh, I guess there's a reason you're still in the game..
Am I just doing badly or are you just getting super lucky?!
Did I jinx myself by thinking I was going to win? I'm still sorta close...
What are you doing? It's all one-sided all of a sudden!
Me? Again? Oh no! How did I let this happen?
Stripping is embarrassing enough on its own, so why did I have to go and lose like that a second time?
There's not much I can do if the rest of you are going to be so lucky each time...
Two in a row? No, it's fine. Just bad luck I guess...
How? Again? You would tell me if I was doing something wrong, right?
Apparently I'm the one who needs a spotter in here...
Gosh! You guys are really good at this game!
It doesn't seem fair for me to lose so many times in a row. I'm not sure how I could have prevented it!
Doesn't somebody else want to take a turn?
I'm in real trouble here! Where's help when you need it?
That's too bad, but I had to get started sometime.
It would be a total waste if I didn't strip even once. I'm sure you all feel the same!
Well, that's okay. It's not like I'm in any danger of losing right now.
Oh, I could go for another one! It's no big deal, right?
Oh, I'm not worried. I've been in bigger jams before!
Sometimes you can't help but come up empty. No point in stressing about it!
Oh, I knew I shouldn't have gotten too overconfident. It's not over until it's over.
I... might not come away from all these so squeaky clean, huh?
And I was so close too! I was just thinking I might not have to take anything else off.
Yes... well... I was kind of sort of starting to hope I would win without having to show my... y'know...
Ha ha, well, it would be a lot more embarrassing if I was the only one that was naked.
Yeah, this one isn't really the loss I'm sweating over...
Oh well, no reason to get bent out of shape. I just gotta keep up!
Taking one hit isn't a big deal. That's what the "armor" is for!
Don't count me out yet! I can pull through in a jam if I need to!
A little turbulence never stopped me! Just you wait and see!
If I can land the Flutter when she's only got one engine working, I could still win this even without my pants.
Oh, I've pulled off bigger miracles with less material than this. I can handle it!
Uh-oh. I'm starting to think I'm going to be one of the big losers here...
Now things are looking pretty dicey...
That's not good. I was hoping I had at least one more round before I had to take this off...
I'm not feeling so confident about winning anymore...
Oh, this is so embarrassing. At least I won't be the only one...
Well... could be worse, right? Right?
Darn, I was hoping to hold out just a little longer before I lost.
I saw this happening a little later in my head...
Am I missing something? I feel like I should be doing a lot better...
Luck is a much bigger part of this than I anticipated...
Oh, well, that's okay! I can't let it get me down! Maybe my luck will turn around!
No reason to get bent out of shape! If I have some bad luck now, that just means it will turn around later, right?
I promise I'm not trying to lose on purpose. I just can't seem to string enough wins together.
Seems inevitable that I'm going to lose even more, huh?
Oh, it's embarrassing enough to be playing so poorly. This isn't going to help either.
As if all the losing wasn't already embarrassing enough...
Oh no! Really? I was hoping to avoid being the first one completely out of clothes if possible...
Do I really have to be the first one to be completely naked? That's maybe the one thing I really really wanted to avoid!
I do get that sometimes. It's kind of an old-fashioned notion, but I'm a little old-fashioned myself. I don't know, what do you think about it?
Yup! My grandpa found him and adopted him, but he let me name him. Maybe it is a little strange, but I was just a kid when I picked it out for him.
Well, it's his job to clean the toilet. He's pretty good about getting that done.
I asked her quite a few times, but she would always get all cagey and not give a straight answer. She's helped Mega Man before even though we're enemies, so there has to be some reason.
G-gosh, it's kinda weird to hear you say that. I always thought people just saw me as a greasy mechanic...
It has been, and I think I'm the one most surprised by that. I thought I might be too nervous to go through with it, but now that I made it this far...
Wait, are you saying you like it? You like my work clothes?
Whoa? Really? I thought magic was supposed to just solve all your problems with the snap of your fingers!
Right, my name is a food too. I've heard that one before, but I don't hold it against bread rolls. Personally, I like bread rolls.
Oh, is that why you're asking about the Flutter? Trying to invite yourself over? I don't know how I'd explain you to Gramps or Mega Man.
Usually nobody bats an eye, but for some reason people around here have trouble accepting it. Not sure why that is.
They're energy resources. Everything and anything that needs power runs off of refractor shards. We pretty much never have cash, but we can buy things with just refractor shards just as reliably.
I'm sure you think that, but it's not like Mega Man hasn't seen me naked. Even if those were accidents...
Gosh... you certainly have an active imagination...
I bet that's pretty handy. The ruins we go into have pretty much no information like that. Just an army for reaverbots defending them.
Thanks, and I'm sorry if it's difficult to talk about. Even now when I think about Mega Man traveling up to the moon without me, I do feel a little sad.

Building and funding the rocket all by myself wasn't going to be possible. I needed help, but the help I got was... not my first choice. We wasted a lot of time and resources because we couldn't stop arguing.
When I first met you, you seemed so cool and in control. I couldn't have possibly imagined something like this might make you nervous...

The only impossibility was us seeing eye to eye, but we managed to do that long enough to succeed. Despite everything, I am grateful for her help...
Uh... Bobobo...
Their purpose is to protect against reaverbots, aggressive machines. I mean, we do have to fight off pirates every so often, but even then all we do is disable their vehicle...
I feel that way sometimes too. I even feel bad about destroying the reaverbots who attack us sometimes. The way they move around sometimes you'd swear they're alive.

Some of the reaverbots we've seen act and move around as if they were living things, so I get it. Even though they're dangerous and attack us, I still feel a little sad about destroying them sometimes.
I like to think I'm a pretty good mechanic, but nothing holds up forever. Especially stuff that's constantly getting shot at or blown up.
Machines aren't so different from people, after all. Without constant care, even we would fall to pieces. Even a good mechanic can only do so much sometimes.
You'd have to be careful you don't take off anything important. It is a weapon, after all.
I'd be careful with something like that, Nagatoro. It's a weapon and not a toy. You might slice something important off.

What are you imagining? It was just a little plastic casing that I put a small motor inside of so it would vibrate....
Wait wait wait! I didn't build like a--- a full on--- it wasn't--- look! It was just a motor in a little plastic casing! That's it!
A generator? I've worked on that kind of thing before! Seen all shapes and kinds, really! There were even a few that powered security doors!
Oh, yeah, I've seen that sort of thing before! Worked on my fair share as well! Even a few that powered security doors.

Boring wouldn't be all that bad if it was a stable income. It can be a little stressful to dig up enough scrap to put food on the table let alone keep the Flutter aloft.
Oh, Dwight, don't be so hard on yourself. I'm sure you did the best job you could, and that's what counts the most!

Oh! Haha! Well--- it's all n-normal human parts, like you're probably used to!
Gosh, if only I could keep Mega Man locked up sometimes. Sometimes he just barges into my room when I'm changing clothes. He doesn't even knock!

Yeah, the very last one. They called him "The Master," but now he's gone along with the rest of humanity. It was... a lot to take in when I found out.
Huh, it's interesting that you'd know that. It is a little sad that it didn't work out and all the humans are gone now though. Finding that out was... well, it gives me shivers even now!

Guys do like lasers and swords, don't they? Mega Man had me make those sorts of weapons for him too. They are fun to build and fun to see in action! I always thought the saber was a little impractical, but it is really cool when it flashes to life and cuts a reaverbot down to size!

Mega Man likes lasers and swords too! I've built and rebuilt those weapons for him a whole bunch of times! They're fun to work on and I really like seeing them in action! When the big laser goes off, it blasts reaverbots away like they're nothing!
I wouldn't say the reaverbots are evil. They're just in the way and aggressive. They're only doing what they were designed to do. Sometimes I feel bad that we have to destroy them sometimes.
Oh! Gosh! More than once! I've gotten them stuck in my hair too. I'm even scared to run my brush through it most days...

Hey, I think it's a cool name! I don't think it's any stranger than being named "Roll" or "~player~" or even "Sheena." Besides, how would you feel if someone asked you if Sheena was actually your real name?

It doesn't? I sure wonder about it sometimes. Even though he was gone for so long, he's still the same. Still sticking up for me, still helping me out, and still bringing me things he finds in he junkyard...
I didn't actually go there myself. We sent the rocket to the moon on a rescue mission. It wasn't big enough to hold us and the people we were trying to rescue, unfortunately.

Being at the beach is way different from being out on the ocean all the time. I still get excited when we call get a chance to play on the shore!
I don't many opportunities to play on the beach. I mean, I'm out over the ocean all the time, but the shore is still a ton of fun!
Now that it's summer, maybe I should see about taking a boat out on the water...
You know what I haven't done in a while? I haven't taken the boat out on the water for a trip. Summer seems like the perfect time for it, doesn't it?

I... uh... I hope my swimsuit isn't weird. It was a bit of a spur of the moment purchase...
My... uh... my swimsuit isn't strange or anything, is it? I sort of just got it on impulse, to be honest.

I don't get out of the Flutter, our ship, all that much. It's my house and my workshop as well as how Gramps, Mega Man, and me all get around. I usually don't have much reason to leave.
Normally I stay at home on our airship, the Flutter, with Gramps and Mega Man. I don't have a ton of opportunities to meet new people, so this is a nice change of pace.

It's nice to meet some new people like this. I live on an airship, the Flutter, with Gramps and Mega Man. I love them both, and the Flutter has everything I need, but even I get tired of the same routine after a while.
I don't really have a lot of romantic or sexual experience, to be honest. Not a lot of chances for that sort of thing when you're constantly on the move.
It will be fun getting to know you all here, but I'm hoping I get to know myself a little better too. When you're stuck on an airship most days, you don't get a lot of romantic or sexual experience.
There's pretty much no opportunity for me to do anything like this back home. Barely a chance for any sort of romantic or sexual experience. Not a lot of privacy either...
I wasn't even sure I'd have to courage to show my breasts, but now that I have I feel... lighter? Unburdened?
